name: Neko Friends Trainer
highlight: 8888 playable 3D NFT Nekos. The first live open-world 3D play as your NFT game on Avalanche.
summary: Neko Friends are a collection of 8888 NFTS and 3D in-game characters. The playable video game style 3D open-world game has had Neko owners running around and winning great prizes with their Nekos since May 10, 2022. Each Neko's different NFT traits affect your in-game ability and playstyle in an ever-evolving and unfolding 3D open-world game. This play-for-fun, 'for all ages' style video game experience allows players to own even a single character and get access to run around and play with their character/NFT in all future updates, games and experiences. Nothing to download to play, PlayStation and Xbox gamepad enabled, updates published regularly.
